body:
## Steps to Reproduce

MacOS Mojave 12.2 on M1
IntelliJ 2021.3.2
Dart 2.14.4

comment_data.body: This is a dup of https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/94060 and has been fixed. The fix is available on the latest master and beta channels of the Flutter SDK and soon will be available on stable.
